item.description:
This is a group about JavaScript so we should talk about all things JavaScript.

How it's currently used in Websites, the various JavaScript libraries out there, AJAX, the ongoing 'Web 2.0' movement, the use of JavaScript in cutting edge websites and the future of the language and the websites that utilize it.

It won't just be about boring business use of JavaScript either, as JavaScript can be used to create very fun things too :)

This meetup will be pretty informal.

Just a bunch of people getting together who share a common interest, JavaScript.

We'll probably go around an introduce ourselves to each other. Talk a bit about who we are, what we do and why we came.
After that, we'll just discuss whatever we'd like. Maybe share what JavaScript projects we are working on, or talk about what ambitious JavaScript ideas we have in mind.
item.how_to_find_us: Tavern in the Square in CENTRAL Square. WE WILL BE IN THE SIDE ROOM!!!! ASK THE HOSTESS AT THE FRONT OR PROCEED TO YOUR LEFT TO THE BACK LEFT ONCE INSIDE.
item.name: The Boston JavaScript February Meetup
